resources.string: Thanks for filling the inspection report. Your report has been submitted
Thank you for filling the inspection report for. Since you have filled the report in offline mode, please manually submit the form when connected to the internet from the "Submit form" option
\u0020\u0020Please fill in all the relevant details of the school.

This app is a demo app for Samiksha app which is a product of the Department of Education, Haryana Government.\nThe application is used to record observations of academic and non-academic nature from school visits across the state.
